00026 namespace uvm_ml {
00027     void uvm_ml_run_test(const std::vector<std::string>& tops,  const char * test) {
00028         int top_n = tops.size();
00029         const char ** local_tops = new const char*[top_n];
00030         const sc_time & duration = sc_time(~sc_dt::UINT64_ZERO, false) - sc_time_stamp(); 
00031 
00032         for (int i = 0; i < top_n; ++i) {
00033             local_tops[i] = tops[i].c_str();
00034         }
00035         BP(run_test)(framework_id, top_n, const_cast<char**>(local_tops), const_cast<char*>(test));
00036         sc_start(duration);
00037         delete[] local_tops;
00038         
00039     }

00050 
00051 void handle_sc_kernel_exception_message
00052 (
00053   uvm_ml_kernel_exception_message message,
00054   const char* string1,
00055   const char* string2
00056 ) {
00057 
00058   char msg[1024];
00059   switch (message) {
00060 
00061     case UVM_ML_CREATE_SC_INST:
00062       sprintf(msg, "\nSystemC module defname is '%s' \nHDL instname is '%s'",
00063               string1, string2
00064              );
00065       SC_REPORT_ERROR(msg,"\n");
00066       break;
00067 
00068     case UVM_ML_CREATE_SC_INST_2:
00069       sprintf(msg, "instname is '%s'", string1);
00070       SC_REPORT_ERROR(msg,"\n");
00071       break;
00072 
00073     case UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION:
00074       SC_REPORT_ERROR("SC_ID_COSIM_ERR_IN_QUASI_STATIC_ELAB","\n");
00075       CURRENT_SIMCONTEXT_SET_ERROR();
00076       break;
00077 
00078     default:
00079       assert(false);
00080       break;
00081   }      
00082 }
00083

00095 const std::string& uvm_ml_utils::get_systemc_separator() { 
00096 #ifdef MTI_SYSTEMC
00097     static const std::string separator("/");
00098 #else
00099     static const std::string separator(".");
00100 #endif
00101     return separator;
00102 }

00104 void uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base::object(sc_object* b) {
00105   sc_module* m = NULL;
00106   m_obj = b;
00107   uvm_ml_utils::add_transrec_to_map(m_obj, this);
00108   if (is_transmitter()) {
00109     sc_object* obj = b->get_parent();
00110     while (obj) {
00111         //      if (typeid(*obj) == typeid(parent_component_proxy)) return; // Parent proxy shall not be registered as a root node
00112       sc_module* mm = DCAST<sc_module*>(obj);
00113       if (!mm) break;
00114       m = mm;
00115       obj = obj->get_parent();
00116     }
00117     if (m) uvm_ml_utils::register_static_top(m->name());
00118   }
00119 }
00120 
00121 void uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base::bind_export(sc_export_base* b) { 
00122   sc_module* top;
00123   object(b);
00124   m_iface = b->get_interface();
00125   sc_object* obj = b->get_parent(); 
00126   while (obj) { 
00127       //    if (typeid(*obj) == typeid(parent_component_proxy)) return; // Parent proxy shall not be registered as a root node
00128     sc_module* mm = DCAST<sc_module*>(obj); 
00129     if (!mm) break;
00130     top = mm; 
00131     obj = obj->get_parent();
00132   } 
00133   uvm_ml_utils::register_static_top(top->name());
00134 }

00137 namespace uvm_ml {
00138  int associate_module(const char*  name, uvm_ml_new_module_func f) { 
00139    if (!new_module_funcs) { 
00140     new_module_funcs = new sc_strhash<uvm_ml_new_module_func>(); 
00141    } 
00142    new_module_funcs->insert((char*)name,f); 
00143    return 0; 
00144  }
00145 }
00146 static std::string replaceCharByChar(
00147   const std::string& s,
00148   char oldChar,
00149   char newChar
00150 ) {
00151   std::string ss = s.c_str();
00152   for (unsigned i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
00153     if (s[i] == oldChar) {
00154       ss[i] = newChar;
00155     }
00156   }
00157   return ss;
00158 }
00159 
00160 const char SC_HIERARCHY_SUBSTITUTION_CHAR = '$';
00161 
00162 static std::string purify_name(std::string name) {
00163   std::string pname = replaceCharByChar(
00164     name,
00165     SC_HIERARCHY_CHAR,
00166     SC_HIERARCHY_SUBSTITUTION_CHAR
00167   );
00168   return pname;
00169 }
